title: Stadium ŠKP Inter Dúbravka
text: Stadium ŠKP Inter Dúbravka () is a <a href="association%20football">football</a> stadium in <a href="D%C3%BAbravka%2C%20Bratislava">Dúbravka</a>, <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a> and is the home stadium of the <a href="FK%20Inter%20Bratislava">FK Inter Bratislava</a> and <a href="FK%20%C5%A0KP%20Inter%20D%C3%BAbravka%20Bratislava">FK ŠKP Inter Dúbravka Bratislava</a>. <a href="FK%20Inter%20Bratislava">FK Inter Bratislava</a> started playing at the stadium in Summer 2014. Stadium capacity is 5000, including 250 VIP seats. Stadium is currently used by most successful American football team in Slovakia - <a href="Bratislava%20Monarchs">Bratislava Monarchs</a>.
